title: To Kill a Mockingbird
author: Harper Lee
description: A novel about the serious issues of rape and racial inequality told through the eyes of young Scout Finch.

author: George Orwell
description: A dystopian social science fiction novel and cautionary tale about the future.

title: Pride and Prejudice
author: Jane Austen
description: A romantic novel that critiques the British landed gentry at the end of the 18th century.

title: The Great Gatsby
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
description: A story about the Jazz Age and the American Dream.

title: Moby Dick
author: Herman Melville
description: An epic tale of obsession and revenge between Captain Ahab and the white whale, Moby Dick.
